dct_title_s: Improved map of the territories of Michigan and Ouisconsin, pronounced Wisconsin
dct_description_sm: hand col.; Farmer's map of Michigan & Ouisconsin.;Entered for copyright 9th Novr. 1835.; 4060 1836 .F2;ICN78 rev.;Improved map of the territories of Michigan and Ouisconsin, pronounced Wisconsin.;Includes advertisement for Colton inside front cover.; Map of part of Ste. Marie River from actual survey;Oriented with north at upper left.; Greenwich, Washington.;Relief shown with hachures.; J.H. Colton & Co., 1836.;scale 8 miles to an inch.;1 map, hand colored;53 x 86 cm. folded in covers 15 x 10 cm.;1:1,900,800
